entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
